Articles.Content:
Hi! I play RSS with a lot of mods, but I can't ever find some nice panels that look like I want them too. I tried to make them out of IR (infernal robotics) parts but they ended up too bulky.

If someone could model two solar panels for me, and could import them into Blender then I would be great appreciative to no avail, and presumably so would the rest of the RSS community.

These are the types of panels (x2):

![nasa-Orbiting-Carbon-Observatory-2-001.jpg.662x0_q100_crop-scale.jpg](http://media.treehugger.com/assets/images/2014/06/nasa-Orbiting-Carbon-Observatory-2-001.jpg.662x0_q100_crop-scale.jpg)

Carbon Observatory 2

![TDRS.jpg](http://abyss.uoregon.edu/~js/images/TDRS.jpg)

TDRS D

Just the addition of these solar panels would be a brilliant mod in itself IMO.

Cheers, CP

Raidernick made a TDRS-D satellite (at my request)! It's in his American probes pack

For the first satellite, I think the Near Future Solar has those panels (or something like them)

Near Future:

[http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/52042-0-90-0-25-Near-Future-Technologies-%28NFPropulsion-0-90%29](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/52042-0-90-0-25-Near-Future-Technologies-%28NFPropulsion-0-90%29)

US Probes Pack

[http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/93389-0-90-US-Probes-Pack-Old-and-New-v0-30-Release-2-7-15](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/93389-0-90-US-Probes-Pack-Old-and-New-v0-30-Release-2-7-15)
